org.jooby.spi

Interface NativeWebSocket


  • public interface NativeWebSocket
    A web socket upgrade created from NativeRequest.upgrade(Class).
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close(int status,
           String reason)
        Close the web socket.
        Parameters:
        status - A web socket close status.
        reason - A close reason.

      • resume

        void resume()
        Resume reads.

      • onConnect

        void onConnect(Runnable callback)
        Set the onconnect callback. It will be execute once per each client.
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback.

      • onTextMessage

        void onTextMessage(Consumer<String> callback)
        Set the ontext message callback. On message arrival the callback will be executed.
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback.

      • onBinaryMessage

        void onBinaryMessage(Consumer<ByteBuffer> callback)
        Set the onbinary message callback. On message arrival the callback will be executed.
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback.

      • onCloseMessage

        void onCloseMessage(BiConsumer<Integer,Optional<String>> callback)
        Set the onclose message callback. It will be executed when clients close a connection and/or connection idle timeout.
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback.

      • onErrorMessage

        void onErrorMessage(Consumer<Throwable> callback)
        Set the onerror message callback. It will be executed on errors.
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause reads.

      • terminate

        void terminate()
        throws IOException
        Terminate immediately a connection.
        Throws:
        IOException - If termination fails.

      • sendBytes

        void sendBytes(ByteBuffer data,
               WebSocket.SuccessCallback success,
               WebSocket.OnError err)
        Send a binary message to the client.
        Parameters:
        data - Message to send.
        success - Success callback.
        err - Error callback.

      • sendBytes

        void sendBytes(byte[] data,
               WebSocket.SuccessCallback success,
               WebSocket.OnError err)
        Send a binary message to the client.
        Parameters:
        data - Message to send.
        success - Success callback.
        err - Error callback.

      • sendText

        void sendText(String data,
              WebSocket.SuccessCallback success,
              WebSocket.OnError err)
        Send a text message to the client.
        Parameters:
        data - Message to send.
        success - Success callback.
        err - Error callback.

      • sendText

        void sendText(ByteBuffer data,
              WebSocket.SuccessCallback success,
              WebSocket.OnError err)
        Send a text message to the client.
        Parameters:
        data - Message to send.
        success - Success callback.
        err - Error callback.

      • sendText

        void sendText(byte[] data,
              WebSocket.SuccessCallback success,
              WebSocket.OnError err)
        Send a text message to the client.
        Parameters:
        data - Message to send.
        success - Success callback.
        err - Error callback.

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Returns:
        True if the websocket connection is open.
